description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mobile Broadband driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-30004):

1. Download and install the following updates based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (32-bit): [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (32-bit): [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Details**:
- This update resolves the integer overflow issue that could allow for remote code execution, enhancing the security posture of affected systems.
- Verify your Windows version and apply the correct update.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is compatible with the update.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
